description: Whether you think smart glasses are cool or creepy, for most people, they're not a part of everyday life. And a lot of people today, think of Glass as a failed experiment. But Google didn't actually give up on Glass. Meanwhile, Facebook and Apple are interested in building augmented reality glasses. And AR start-ups like Magic Leap are getting huge investments. So why don't you see people wearing them on the street? Well, the reality of AR is a lot more nuance than the fantasy.
